title: SCF Post Type(s)
description: Schema for Secure Custom Fields post type definitions - accepts single object or array. Properties marked '[SCF Export Only]' are preserved during export but not used functionally during import.

oneOf.description: Array of post type objects (export format)

key.description: Unique identifier for the post type with post_type_ prefix (e.g. 'post_type_book')

title.description: The title/name of the post type

post_type.description: The post type key passed to register_post_type() (e.g. 'book', 'product'). Max 20 characters, lowercase letters/numbers/underscores/dashes only, cannot be WordPress reserved terms.

active.description: [SCF] Whether this post type is active

advanced_configuration.description: [SCF Export Only] Whether advanced configuration options are enabled. Accepts boolean or integer (0/1).

import_source.description: [SCF Export Only] Source of import if this post type was imported

import_date.description: [SCF Export Only] Date when this post type was imported

modified.description: [SCF Export Only] Unix timestamp of last modification

labels.description: Labels for the post type in various contexts

name.description: General name for the post type, usually plural

singular_name.description: Name for one object of this post type

all_items.description: The 'All Items' text used in the admin menu

description.description: A short description of what your post type is

public.description: Whether a post type is intended for use publicly either via the admin interface or by front-end users

hierarchical.description: Whether the post type is hierarchical (e.g. page)

exclude_from_search.description: Whether to exclude posts with this post type from front-end search results

publicly_queryable.description: Whether queries can be performed on the front-end for the post type as part of parse_request()

show_ui.description: Whether to generate and allow a UI for managing this post type in the admin

show_in_menu.description: Where to show the post type in the admin menu

menu_order.description: [SCF Export Only] The order of this post type in the admin menu

menu_position.description: The position in the menu order. SCF exports as empty string or null when not set, integer when set. Import accepts all types and casts to integer.

oneOf.description: Icon as string: Dashicon name (e.g. 'dashicons-admin-post') or full URL to image file

type.description: Icon source type: 'dashicons' for WordPress dashicons, 'url' for custom image

value.description: The icon value: dashicon class name (e.g. 'dashicons-admin-post') or image URL

menu_icon.description: The menu icon. Can be a string (URL or dashicon name) or SCF object format with type and value properties.

admin_menu_parent.description: The parent menu slug for this post type menu

show_in_admin_bar.description: Whether to make this post type available in the WordPress admin bar

show_in_nav_menus.description: Whether post_type is available for selection in navigation menus

supports.description: Core feature(s) the post type supports. Common values: 'title', 'editor', 'author', 'thumbnail', 'excerpt', 'trackbacks', 'custom-fields', 'comments', 'revisions', 'page-attributes', 'post-formats'. Custom supports are also allowed.

taxonomies.description: An array of taxonomy identifiers that will be registered for the post type. SCF exports as empty string when none selected, but accepts both array and string on import.

can_export.description: Whether to allow this post type to be exported

delete_with_user.description: Whether to delete posts of this type when deleting a user

has_archive.description: Whether there should be post type archives, or if a string, the archive slug to use

has_archive_slug.description: The slug to use for the archive if has_archive is enabled

rewrite.description: Triggers the handling of rewrites for this post type

with_front.description: Whether the permalink structure should be prepended with WP_Rewrite::$front (accepts boolean or string '0'/'1' for backward compatibility)

feeds.description: Whether the feed permalink structure should be built for this post type (accepts boolean or string '0'/'1' for backward compatibility)

pages.description: Whether the permalink structure should provide for pagination (accepts boolean or string '0'/'1' for backward compatibility)

query_var.description: Sets the query_var key for this post type

capability_type.description: The string to use to build the read, edit, and delete capabilities

rename_capabilities.description: Whether to rename capabilities for this post type

singular_capability_name.description: The singular capability name (e.g. 'post' creates 'edit_post', 'delete_post' capabilities)

plural_capability_name.description: The plural capability name (e.g. 'posts' creates 'edit_posts', 'delete_posts' capabilities)

capabilities.description: [SCF Not Yet Supported] Custom capabilities for this post type. This property is preserved in exports but not currently implemented during import. Currently, use the rename_capabilities system instead for custom capability names.

map_meta_cap.description: Whether to use the internal default meta capability handling

show_in_rest.description: Whether to include the post type in the REST API

rest_base.description: To change the base URL of REST API route

rest_namespace.description: To change the namespace URL of REST API route

rest_controller_class.description: REST API Controller to use for this post type

register_meta_box_cb.description: Callback function for custom meta box registration

enter_title_here.description: Custom placeholder text for the title field
